sub_title: Co-Founder @ Signit | E-signature Solutions for the Middle East
summary:
An established strategy consultant with 20 years of experience in consulting and advisory across Europe and the Middle East.

I have invested and supported a number of startups over the past 8 years - and have been a co-founder of two startups.

I have worked extensively throughout my career with policy-makers, governments and companies on strategy, organization, human capital development and large scale transformation programs in complex multi-stakeholder environments.

Now working as a co-founder of Signit, a Saudi technology company focused on building digital trust infrastructure for the region's digital economy.

We developed Signit, the Arabic-first, Saudi-born e-signature solution, in 2021, with the aim to help companies build trusted and valuable business relationships, remove the hassle of paperwork and focus on what matters. 

Our aim is to become the one-stop solution for all digital agreements in the region.
